attributes.action: encourage all those standing for elected office, from whatever party, to commit to the Peoples Pledge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All the political parties make pledges about policy and manifesto commitments - we believe that you should now make a pledge that will restore faith in politicians and in British politics. Before we vote for ANYONE, we want three commitments from the candidate - straightforward, simple and easy to understand.

1. Tell the truth.
2. Admit when you are wrong.
3. Listen to the voices of the voters more carefully.

Check out the people's pledge on www.thepeoplespledge.com

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk/
